name: Xochipilli's Trade
description:
Sacrifice your companions to please the foreign gods. Be Generous, they may reward you with good fortune in the temple. Find items and perks during your descent and kill the great Ocelolaloni to get the precious relic of Xochipilli.

KeyboardControllerMoveArrowsLeft Joystick
JumpSpaceASlashDXFireFB

This game has been created during the ludum dare #44

Code by Jonathan Giezendanner, art by Tristan Thévenoz, music & sound by Pierrick Oggier
